page.title: 15Local Churches.
page.content: The oldest{church,}St.James the Less -known as{Hadleigh Church}-is little changed since it was first built as the centre of the medieval community 600yrs. ago. As a contrast, nearby {St.Barnabas}and{St.Aidan's}in the Fairway are modern brick buildings. The latter was built in 1971: it is lofty and spacious with two striking stained glass windows,tall and narrow. The services at St.Aidan's are typical of an{Anglican}church. Scouts, Guides, Cubs and Brownies attend a parade service on the 1stSunday of each month and the hall is used for social activities. Some families in the area have no time for religion, but for those who do there are{churches}and {chapels}of various denominations to cater for them and there is also the {Salvation Army.
